FuncDef: The reset value-added-service user-information statistics history command clears DAA users' historical statistics.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view DAA users' statistics within a period, run the reset value-added-service user-information statistics history command to clear the DAA users' historical statistics.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
To clear DAA users' historical statistics, run the reset value-added-service user-information statistics history command. Cleared historical statistics cannot be restored. Therefore, exercise caution when running this command.
